snippet.title: A.R.M - Absolutely Reliable Machine- Demo Trailer
snippet.description:
My solo developed game "A.R.M" finally has playable Demo!



A.R.M - Absolutely Reliable Machine - is a simple action game about taking the inevitable fight against fearful monsters that want to destroy our world!
Arm up with A.R.M and save the world!

You even don't need to download the game.
Just go to this link and play on the web!
https://nevertheless-studio.itch.io/arm-for-saving




steam store page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1230010/ARM_Absolutely_Reliable_Machine/


twitter(dev log): https://twitter.com/NeverthelessSt5
